graduationProject.title: Browser of GraphQL queries, clone of GraphiQL
RS-Healthy App
graduationProject.description: project working with Fitness API and Spoonacular API (meals), Google Maps API. After user input some values about himself our app can propose personal data for this user about health and propose meal plan for user and closest sport areas.

specialtyName: honors master's degree in the field of study «Information Technologies of Design», qualification «Computer System Analyst»
